de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.chat

Interface IChatAdministrator


  • public interface IChatAdministrator
    Defines the chat server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isConnectedUser(int userid, int sessionid)
      Checks whether the user is connected to the chat.
      void logOff(de.ityx.mediatrix.modules.chat.ChatConnection con)
      The user from the ChatConnection is logged off at the system.

    • Method Detail

      • isConnectedUser

        boolean isConnectedUser(int userid,
                      int sessionid)
        Checks whether the user is connected to the chat.
        Parameters:
        userid - the operator id
        sessionid - the session id
        Returns:
        true if the user is connected to the chat otherwise false

      • logOff

        void logOff(de.ityx.mediatrix.modules.chat.ChatConnection con)
        The user from the ChatConnection is logged off at the system.
        Parameters:
        con - the chat connection

      • propagate

        void propagate(de.ityx.mediatrix.modules.chat.ChatMessage message)
        Sends the message among users.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
